Profile

Jhonny Dichoso

Mr. Jhonny Jose Dichoso is currently working as Web Development supervisor in an IT company, where he provides team lead expertise in graphic designing and web development but also people management and mentoring.

Prior to joining in the IT industry, He served in the academe for nine (9) years and also taught some of major computer subjects in the tertiary level such as Database Management System, Data Structure and Algorithm, Operating System, Software Testing, Static & Dynamic Web Development, System Analysis & Design, Human Computer Interaction, Automata & Language Theory, and Professional Ethics. He was also a professor in the graduate school of the same institution where he engaged stakeholders, school teachers & school principals for greater innovation, modernization, and application of technology in their respective schools through Master classes related to the Information Technology Development course.

His professional education gave him the foundation for his career path in the Information Technology industry. He finished his Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and pursued his graduate studies and completed his Master’s Degree in Information Technology.

Profile

Vincent Ramirez

Mr. Vincent Ramirez is currently working as a Web Developer specializing in front-end designing. Because of his industry experience from previous and current companies focusing on programming, web design and web development, he was able to mentor students in the senior high school level to have IT work related experience in the company where he is currently affiliated.

He finished his Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and because of his desire to have continuous learning, he has an on-going studies and is taking Masters of Science in Information Technology.

Profile

Miguel Neil Nuñez

Mr. Miguel Nuñez is working as a social media manager as he administers his foreign client company’s social media marketing and advertising. He manages social media marketing campaigns and day-to-day activities like developing relevant content topics to reach the company’s target customers. He also creates, curates and manages all published content such as images, video, written and audio/post in different social media platforms.

His work experience gave him in-depth knowledge and understanding of different social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, Pinterest, etc. and how each platform can be deployed in different scenarios which develops his ability to effectively communicate information and ideas in written and video format with the help of different video editing softwares and technologies.

Profile

Mon Plaza

Mr. Ramon plaza is currently working as a Senior Web Developer with specialization in Wordpress Development. His years of experience in the IT industry gave him a strong foundation to his career in web development as well as his previous work experience when he provided content support for the content loading team and also handled issues regarding Sharepoint and SiteCore functionality. He also performs online quality review and Quality Assurance Testing for the Baker McKenzie Link LMS services.

Because of his teaching background, he is also involved in mentoring students in the collegiate and high school level taking immersion programs in the field of ICT to have work related experience in web development through actual projects following industry standards in web designing and programming.

He finished his Bachelor's degree in Computer Science which gave him a lot of opportunities to work in different fields like teaching and skills practice in the industry.
